title: Labels
narrative:
This spec demonstrates the use of labels
    in Swing-Tree.

features.id: A label UI can be created using the UI.label(..) factory method.

blocks.text: We create a label UI node...
The label UI is not null.
The UI node wraps a JLabel.
The label has the specified text.

features.id: The icon of a label may be specified using an `IconDeclaration`.

blocks.text: We create an `IconDeclaration` as a simple path provider.
We create a new label ui node with the icon declaration.
The icon should be loaded and displayed.
The icon should be the same as the one we specified.
The label should have the specified text.

features.id: Create labels with custom horizontal and vertical alignment.

blocks.text: We create a label with custom alignment.
The label should have the specified alignment.
We use the `withAlignment` method to create another label...

features.id: Create labels with custom horizontal and vertical text position.

blocks.text: We create a label with custom text position.
The label should have the specified text position.
We use the `withTextPosition` method to create another label...
Both text positions should be set.
